pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geist is a font family by Vercel. Geist Sans is a sans-serif typeface for legibility and simplicity. It is a modern, geometric typeface designed to be used on headlines, logos, posters and other large display sizes. Geist Mono is a monospaced typeface crafted to be a partner to Geist Sans and be used in code editors, diagrams, or terminals.
